text: <@U0392S20HV3> Hi, thank you for your response. Since we publish our page using our own domain, We should still consider preloading or prefetching specific resources. This can help optimize the performance and loading speed of our website? What are your thoughts on this matter?
I would have to look at the published page in order to determine which assets would benefit from preloading/prefetching.

Here is the sample page that we would like to improve the seo <https://projects.constructconnect.com/details/6260043-service-station-car-wash-renovation&find_loc=california-94568> also please take note that this is a dynamic pages.
Does anyone know if it's possible to add Blog tags and author's pages in the sitemap?
